knimeNode.name: Sample/Snp (CHROM/POS)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Gets the number of Samples having a SNP at a given position

fullDescription.intro:
This node gets the number of Samples having a given SNP. It adds an integer column for the number of columns per snp. This node only considers the positions (CHROM/POS), but not REF and ALT. Rows must be sorted by chom/pos/sample
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
